## Related Work

### Causal Extraction Systems
- **BECauSE** [@dunietz-etal-2017-because]: Corpus of causal and purpose relations

### Linguistic Frameworks

- **Cruse [@cruse1986]**: Lexical semantic analysis of causative verbs
- **Wolff [@wolff2005expressing]**: Force dynamics in causal reasoning
- **Talmy [@talmy1988forcedynamics]**: Force dynamics in language and cognition

### Computational Methods

- **BERT-based Extraction** [@li2021]: Transformer models for causal relation classification
- **Knowledge Graphs** [@wu2025ckgeie]: Event-Influence Extraction

## Tools & Libraries

The framework builds on several open-source tools:

- **[Hugging Face Transformers](https://huggingface.co/transformers)**: Base models and training infrastructure
- **[spaCy](https://spacy.io)**: Dependency parsing for syntactic projection
- **[NetworkX](https://networkx.org)**: Graph construction and analysis
- **[Plotly](https://plotly.com/python/)**: Interactive visualizations
